meanings.sent1: She is reestimating the cost of the project.
meanings.sent2: The team is reestimating the time needed for completion.
meanings.sent3: After reestimating the ingredients, she realized she forgot the sugar.
meanings.sent4: Reestimating the distance to the destination, he realized he had taken a wrong turn.
meanings.sent5: The act of reestimating can lead to more accurate results.

meanings.sent1: The economist is reestimating the country's GDP growth.
meanings.sent2: They are reestimating the number of attendees for the event.
meanings.sent3: Reestimating the time it would take, he decided to leave earlier.
meanings.sent4: She is reestimating the value of her antique collection.
meanings.sent5: Reestimating the situation, he realized he needed to change his strategy.
